original_title: 淫造人間オルガ 恍惚の秘密兵器
overview: Near future, Japan. Due to a genetic recombination accident that occurred in a top-secret project, brutal clones with physical abilities dozens of times greater than humans were created, and their massacre of humanity began. In order to exterminate the evil clones, the government created a single combat clone. His name is Olga----Olga (Satomi Mizutani), who got into Guevara's hideout to save his friend who fell into the hands of the evil clone Guevara, was waiting for the vicious clones' obscene rape.
title: Lewd Human Olga Secret Weapon of Ecstasy
